pl.edu.icm.cermine.tools.timeout

Class Timeout

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.icm.cermine.tools.timeout.Timeout

  • public class Timeout
extends Object
    Class that throws an exception when given amount of time has already passed when its check() method is called.
    Author:
    Mateusz Kobos

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Timeout()
      Create a new instance and with the deadline set in an unattainable future.
      Timeout(long timeoutMillis)
      Create a new instance with the deadline set corresponding to given timeout value.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void check()
      Throw exception if it already is the deadline time or past it.
      static Timeout min(Timeout t0, Timeout t1)
      Return the timeout corresponding to the more immediate deadline.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Timeout

        public Timeout(long timeoutMillis)
        Create a new instance with the deadline set corresponding to given timeout value. If the timeout is set to 0, the first call of check() method will result in throwing the TimeoutException.
        Parameters:
        timeoutMillis - timeout in milliseconds

      • Timeout

        public Timeout()
        Create a new instance and with the deadline set in an unattainable future.

    • Method Detail

      • check

        public void check()
           throws TimeoutException
        Throw exception if it already is the deadline time or past it.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - TimeoutException

      • min

        public static Timeout min(Timeout t0,
                          Timeout t1)
        Return the timeout corresponding to the more immediate deadline.
        Parameters:
        t0 - timeout
        t1 - timeout
        Returns:
        earlier timeout
